synopsis.text: Teenager Hata Kosaku is devastated when his favorite pop idol Kusakabe Yuka suddenly announces her retirement. Kosaku, being Yuka's biggest fan, sinks into depression and isolates himself. However, on the day Kosaku's friends convince him to return to school, he gets a pleasant surprise - Yuka has transferred to his agriculture school under the name Ringo Kinoshita. Kosaku realizes he now has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get close to his dream girl and find out why she retired from showbiz. Together with his friends at Tamo Agriculture School, Kosaku works to uncover Ringo's reasons for enrolling at the school while also trying to be more than just classmates with her. Additionally, Kosaku's friend Minori has hidden romantic feelings for him and starts seeing Ringo as a rival. The biggest mystery still remains - why would a famous pop star transfer to an agriculture school? As Kosaku spends more time with Ringo, he aims to solve this puzzle.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
